alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 2:17AM CST until December 27 at 10:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW EXPECTED TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... .A low pressure system moving from the Central Plains states to Wisconsin will bring snow to the area tonight. It will probably end as a little drizzle or freezing drizzle Monday morning. A few hours of moderate to heavy snow could fall during the overnight hours. Two to three inches are expected in the Fox Valley and Lakeshore, with three to four inches elsewhere. Locally higher amounts are possible. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. It could end as freezing drizzle Monday morning. Snow accumulations of 3 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts. A light glaze of ice possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 10 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
